name: Eat The Doughnuts!
description:
Collect as many doughnuts as you can withought being destroyed by cross fire!

This is a simple infinate runner made for Mini Jam #56

Quick side note: it might work a little better on the downloaded version 

This time, the only thing I didn't do is the music for the game and I didn't spend all that much time making graphics :P. I managed to make SFX but not music. Either way, how you enjoy my game!
